Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r Name, include=F}
library(tidyverse, ggplot2)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv("output/run2.csv") %>% 
  mutate(
    engine = as.factor(str_extract(num, "(?!\\d{1,10})(\\w+.+)")),
    num = as.numeric(str_extract(num, "^(\\d)+"))
  )

df %>% 
  ggplot +
  aes(as.factor(num), answer, fill = engine) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0,100000), expand=F) +
  geom_hline(yintercept=29031.7, color="blue") +
  facet_wrap(~engine) +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position=NULL)

```
